value.name: My Roommate is a Cat
value.original_name: 同居人はひざ、時々、頭のうえ。
value.overview: Getting a roommate is the last thing an eccentric author like Mikazuki would do, until a stray cat sparks an idea for his next novel. After plucking the little killer off the streets, Mikazuki is inspired in ways he would have never expected
